item.description:
PLEASE RSVP YES WITH ONLY ONE MEETUP GROUP THIS ENSURES AN ACCURATE COUNT

 Fellow happy hourer and Social Fun organizer, Biagio, has arranged for yet another mix and mingle....which is a joint event of several meetup groups.

Password for entry is SOCIAL FUN

Recommended mode of transporatiion MBTA and/or taxi Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Aquarium (blue line), Haymarket (green & orange lines), State (orange & blue lines), Government Center (blue & green lines), and South Station (red line & commuter rail) subway stations are no more than a five (5) minute walk away.

Below, I've copied some details from the group for which Biagio organizes. Kitty O'Sheas is one of the best spots to host another Mix and Mingle cross Meetup party for 160 members on Friday, September 23, 2011! This is NOT a Singles party. So anyone can come, which means couples are also welcome. Let's get to know one another, socialize, and dance.

PLEASE BE RESPECTFUL TO EACH OTHER

DRINK RESPONSIBLY

Note: Music will be at a medium level in the main room upstairs. The music will be tuned off in the back room upstairs, so members can have a separate area in which to chat. AFTER 9 PM the music will be cranked up in both rooms for dancing, which means, IT WILL GET LOUD. So get there EARLY if you want a chance to have quiet conversation.

Kitty O'Sheas is in Boston (near Faneuil Hall) 131 State St Boston, MA 02109 617-725-0100. The 2nd floor can accommodate 160 people. There are 2 bars upstairs, 4 huge comfortable couches, its own DJ area with light machine and dance floor as well as its own bathroom....the makings for our own private party. Biagio is ordering $350 worth of appetizers (wings, veggie platter, cheeses etc) because Kitty's Kitchen is small and it would be difficult to get enough food for 160 members, individually. The platters will be NOT be refilled with food, so get there EARLY, if you want some grub.

EVERYONE, whether you eat or not, please pay Biagio $5, to help cover the cost of this event, which includes renting the whole 2nd floor, 3 bartenders, and the DJ in addition to the food. Please find Biagio (here's a link with his photo http://photos3.meetupstatic.com/photos/memb... ), at the party to pay him. He is the ONLY person you should pay.

AS ALWAYS YOU MUST MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER

Upon entry into the building Security will check your IDENTIFICATION, (after 9 you will also have to pay a $5 cover) then proceed to the bottom of the stairwell on your left, where you must check in with Security again. You will be able to enter upstairs by telling Security you are with the Social Fun Group because that is how our party is registered. At the top of the stairs be prepared to pay $5 to Biagio, so the line moves quickly and the stairs aren't blocked. If the line on the stairs becomes a problem, Security will make members go back downstairs. Please Note: Upstairs will open at 7:30, so if you arrive early hang at the downstairs bar for a bit. Line for upstairs will begin forming as early as 7:00.

Each Mix + Mingle has reached capacity before 8, so get there EARLY. If you arrive after 8 you may have to wait in a line downstairs before being allowed upstairs. Great reason to get there EARLY.

 

After 9 Kitty O'Sheas charges a mandatory $5 cover to enter the building.

Remember, you will also have to pay $5 to Biagio, who will be upstairs.

 

The invited Meetup Groups are:

Social Fun

World is Our Playground

Volunteer

Boston Euro

Girls Just Want Fun

 

There have been as many as 200 members at these Mix and Mingle cross Meetup parties. Many times there were also a few members who could not get in because when they arrived it was full. So, RSVP now and arrive EARLY.

JOIN US FOR ANOTHER GREAT TIME!
item.how_to_find_us: The entire second floor has been reserved under the name Social Fun
item.name: Boston Mix + Mingle Part 15
